= Installing the libraries =
In the folder where you've unzipped the downloaded [http://symja.googlecode.com/files/meconsole-0.0.9.zip ZIP file], there are 5 JARs which should be on your Java classpath:
  * meconsole009.jar
  * jsr305.jar
  * google-collect-1.0-rc3.jar
  * commons-logging-1.1.1.jar
  * log4j-1.2.11.jar
